escalate: ESC retroactive discount/price adjustment inquiries immediately
ESC if stylists/salons want to carry the products
templates: For any q's about affiliate links, commissions, or salon referral links, use AFQ shortcut
All of the products are unisex, use USX shortcut
drive_to_purchase: Ask the cx what their hair concerns are before making a recommendation!
Make recommendations when cx has specific inquiry, don't send the quiz!
For full haircare regimen inquiries, recommend shampoo, conditioner, and at least one or two other products recommended that align with their need
promo_and_exclusions: When sending a code provide more detail about what the code is valid for!
When sending the promo/code end date, include the time the offer expires as well!

103.SystemMessage12:
Ekster: NEW: Cosmic Orange MagSafe & Nano Cardholder

VIP 20% off: WINTERSUN

A bold upgrade to your MagSafe carry: ekster.attn.tv/aO8eeCPA5t7p
103.SystemMessage13:
Ekster: Hey LuAnn , this is Alex. Thanks for stopping by! üòä ekster.attn.tv/a6RAJO9XJr5v 

Any questions I can answer for you?
103.customerMessage1: Yes, I just got the back plate cash holder. Do I take out the original back plate and replace it with the back plate cash holder?
103.AgentMessage1: Ekster: Yes, you can replace the original backplate with the backplate cash holder for added functionality.
103.customerMessage2: Are the credit cards supposed to fall out of the wallet without pushing the button?
103.customerMessage3: I can literally shake the wallet, easily upside down one time in the credit card( your fake ones that came in it originally )slide out
103.AgentMessage2: Ekster: I'm so sorry to hear the cards slide out with just a shake. They are built for fast card access at the push of a button.
103.customerMessage5: Don't want to lose cards if I happen to hold it upside down.
103.AgentMessage3: Ekster: The Ekster Cardholder Pro is designed to keep your cards secure, so they won't fall out even if the wallet is turned upside down. The card mechanism only ejects your cards when you intentionally activate it, giving you peace of mind that they'll stay in place during everyday use.
103.customerMessage6: And that is why we got it. I will try it with real cards in just a moment.
103.customerMessage7: Is Cardholder 2 the same model as Pro?
103.AgentMessage4: Ekster: The Cardholder 2 and Cardholder Pro are different models. The Pro offers additional features and enhancements.
103.customerMessage8: I need someone to call me. A real person.
103.customerMessage9: Like now. Been dealing with mistakes since Christmas.
103.AgentMessage5: Ekster: I totally understand your concern, and we truly apologize for the inconvenience. I'm a real person, and I'm part of our pre-sales department. Also, we don't offer phone support right now, but let me know if you have any other questions or concerns, and I'd be happy to help!
103.customerMessage14: Then I ordered a cash back plate. I was sent a flimsy little cash holder, then they set up an order for something else, and finally after multiple tries I got the cash back plate. So we're excited to put the cards in the wallet, but with one gentle shake, they fall out Supposedly you can just use one one card, but even with multiple cards, they fall out with a gentle shake and I mean very gentle
103.AgentMessage6: Ekster: Thank you for sharing these with me, and we truly apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. It's certainly not the experience we aim to provide to our customers. In this case, the best way to continue is to email us directly at nest@ekster.com. Our team is more equipped to handle these concerns as they have further access to your order, and are happy to help!
